cards.name: Super Soaker
cards.description: Range of 3 squares. Hits on a roll of [b]5[/b] or [b]6[/b] A hit disorients the target zombie, and the human player may turn the zombie to face any direction. On a roll of OOPS!, the SUPER SOAKER breaks.

cards.name: Lemon Meringue Pie
cards.description: Range of 2 squares. Hits on a roll of [b]5[/b] or [b]6[/b] A hit causes a zombie to become disoriented and the human player may turn the zombie to face any direction. On a roll of OOPS!, out of pies.

cards.name: Kitchen Knife
cards.description: Kills zombies on a roll of [b]6[/b]
